name: golly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to show surprise: by golly Grandad might be 70 but he said he'd finish the marathon and, by golly, he did.

Add to word list
Add to word list
used to express surprise, or to emphasize what you are saying: "He broke his arm and he’ll be out for weeks." "Golly, that’s terrible."
